forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon. High 4C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow for the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 4C. Winds NE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 39F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 24F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.title: Saturday
